uld just drop it into Tomcat 5.0.28 and it would for the most part work.

x


The login came up, tried to login and got

No heritrix instance (or multiple to choose from and we haven't implemented=
 this yet)

Looked through the source and noticed that the 
public static M=
BeanServer registerMBean   in Heritrix.java is not getting called to create=
 the instance.

From what I gather JMX should be calling this??

In the Her=
itrix class the docs say Heritrix can also be embedded or 
launched by weba=
pp initialization

I guess I am missing the initialization step, any help o=
r direction would be apreciated

et the same error on windows and linux.

Thanks for the help in advance
